title: Hypnerotomachia. = The strife of loue in a dreame
author: Colonna, Francesco, d. 1527.
publisher: Printed [by Abell Jeffes, John Charlewood, and Eliot's Court Press] for Simon VVaterson, and are to be sold at his shop, in S. Paules Church-yard, at Cheape-gate,
notes: Translator's dedication signed: R.D., i.e. Sir Robert Dallington?.
A translation of: Colonna, Francesco.  Hypnerotomachia Poliphili.
"Jeffes pr[inted]. at least quires B,D,F,H,I,L,O,R; Charlewood at least A,C,X-Z; Eliot's Court Press at least Aa-Cc"--STC.
Running title reads: The strife of loue in a dreame.
One of three variants of the same year with different publishers' names in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
